statements: SELECT * FROM training_records;
SELECT employee_id, course_name, duration_hours FROM training_records WHERE completion_status='Completed';
SELECT * FROM training_records WHERE duration_hours > 5;
SELECT course_name, course_date FROM training_records WHERE employee_id=3;
SELECT id, course_name FROM training_records ORDER BY course_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM training_records WHERE course_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT course_name, duration_hours FROM training_records WHERE duration_hours >= 3 ORDER BY course_date DESC;
SELECT employee_id, course_name, course_date FROM training_records WHERE completion_status = 'Completed' ORDER BY employee_id, course_date;
SELECT * FROM training_records WHERE employee_id IN (1, 2, 3);
SELECT course_name, COUNT(*) AS total_records FROM training_records GROUP BY course_name HAVING COUNT(*) > 1 ORDER BY total_records DESC;
SELECT * FROM training_records LIMIT 10;
SELECT training_title, training_date FROM training_records WHERE employee_id = 101;
SELECT DISTINCT training_category FROM training_records;
SELECT training_instructor, COUNT(training_category) AS category_count FROM training_records GROUP BY training_instructor;
SELECT employee_id, training_category, training_date FROM training_records WHERE training_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM training_records WHERE training_category = 'Technical' ORDER BY training_date DESC;
SELECT training_title, training_duration, training_instructor FROM training_records WHERE training_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT employee_id, training_title, training_instructor FROM training_records WHERE training_duration > 3 ORDER BY employee_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM training_records WHERE training_category IN ('Soft Skills', 'Leadership') AND training_duration < 5;
SELECT DISTINCT training_category, COUNT(*) AS total_trainings FROM training_records GROUP BY training_category ORDER BY total_trainings DESC;
SELECT * FROM training_records ORDER BY training_date DESC;
SELECT employee_id, training_topic, training_duration_hours FROM training_records WHERE employee_id = 101;
SELECT training_topic, training_duration_hours FROM training_records WHERE training_duration_hours > 2;
SELECT * FROM employee_performance ORDER BY performance_rating ASC, performance_date DESC;
SELECT employee_name, department, hire_date FROM employee_info WHERE department = 'IT';
SELECT * FROM training_records ORDER BY training_date DESC, training_duration_hours ASC LIMIT 10;

SELECT employee_info.employee_name, training_records.training_topic FROM employee_info INNER JOIN training_records ON employee_info.employee_id = training_records.employee_id WHERE training_date > '2021-01-01' AND department = 'HR' ORDER BY training_date ASC;

SELECT employee_name, department, hire_date FROM employee_info WHERE department IN ('HR', 'IT') AND hire_date < '2019-01-01' AND employee_id IN (SELECT employee_id FROM employee_performance WHERE performance_rating > 8) ORDER BY hire_date DESC;

SELECT employee_name, performance_rating, comments FROM employee_info INNER JOIN employee_performance ON employee_info.employee_id = employee_performance.employee_id WHERE performance_date BETWEEN '2020-01-01' AND '2021-12-31' ORDER BY performance_rating DESC, employee_name ASC;

SELECT AVG(performance_rating) AS average_rating, department FROM employee_info INNER JOIN employee_performance ON employee_info.employee_id = employee_performance.employee_id GROUP BY department HAVING AVG(performance_rating) > 6 ORDER BY average_rating DESC;
SELECT * FROM training_records;
SELECT employee_id, employee_name, department FROM employee_details;
SELECT training_name, training_date FROM training_records ORDER BY training_date DESC;
SELECT progress_status, last_updated FROM training_progress WHERE employee_id = 123;
SELECT feedback_text FROM performance_feedback WHERE feedback_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM training_records WHERE employee_id = 101;
SELECT training_name, training_date FROM training_records WHERE training_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT employee_name, department FROM employee_details WHERE department = 'IT';
SELECT record_id, employee_id, progress_status FROM training_progress WHERE progress_status = 'Completed';
SELECT * FROM performance_feedback WHERE feedback_date <= '2021-12-31';
SELECT * FROM training_records;
SELECT training_type, training_duration FROM training_records WHERE training_date = '2022-01-01';
SELECT full_name, job_title FROM employee_profiles WHERE department = 'IT';
SELECT feedback_date, feedback_details FROM employee_feedback ORDER BY feedback_date DESC;
SELECT resource_name, resource_type, resource_link FROM training_resources WHERE resource_type = 'Video';
SELECT * FROM training_records LIMIT 5;
SELECT training_type, training_date, training_duration FROM training_records WHERE training_duration > 30;
SELECT DISTINCT training_type FROM training_records;
SELECT full_name, job_title, department FROM employee_profiles WHERE department = 'Sales';
SELECT employee_id, AVG(performance_rating) AS avg_rating FROM employee_performance GROUP BY employee_id;
